_source.text: AA was beating him and Fedor pulled a Houston Alexander and cro cop has been kod by gabriel gonzaga hes not exactly a top tier hw and fedor couldnt even finish him so lets let him fight the best heavy weights in the world before we call him better than anderson silva silva on the other hand has beat the top middle weights in rich franklin twice, dan henderson, nate marquart, and thales leites, not to mention a brutal knockout of a top lhw forrest griffin
